Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.game.alva

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Assets
    A class that declares and creates references for all animations, textures, and images
    Camera
    Class to control the camera, which follows the Robot object as it moves.
    Element
    Class that represents an object that has a defined location and size
    GameDriver
    non instatiatable class sets up all variables related to the game, has key thread to registered key strokes and released key strokes, sets windows, returns BufferedImages from files
    GameMain
    Creates JFrame object and creates instances of MainComp objects
    MainComp
    Sets the playing board and gets everything ready and instatiated, updates the screen/window for registered key inputs
